definitions: The action of making something rough or uneven.
The initial stage of shaping or processing something, often involving removing large amounts of material.
The act of treating someone roughly or harshly.
Living in basic or difficult conditions.
examples: The roughing of the wood surface prepared it for painting.
The roughing process removed most of the excess metal.
He was accused of roughing up the suspect.
They were roughing it in the wilderness for a week.
